revisionDesc.change: gave full first name and middle initial "John H." in place of first initial "J." in metadata
removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: The leave granted May 17, is extended ten days.
